articles.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to overturn Colorado ban - BBC.com
articles.description: The Trump campaign says keeping him off the ballot is an "un-American" act of election interference.
articles.content:
By Bernd Debusmann JrBBC News, Washington
Donald Trump has asked the US Supreme Court to reverse an unprecedented Colorado ruling that barred him from running for president in that state.

articles.title: Hearing aids may help those with hearing loss live longer, finds analysis - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Hearing loss affects approximately 40 million American adults, yet only one in 10 people who need hearing aids use them, research shows.
articles.content:
Hearing loss affects approximately 40 million American adults, yet only one in 10 people who need hearing aids use them, research shows.
